attributes.action: Require Alistair Darling to resign over the loss of the personal data, of millions of families from the HMRC child benefit system.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Two computer discs containing the personal details of all families in the UK with a child under 16 have gone missing. 
The Child Benefit data on them includes name, address, date of birth, National Insurance number and, where relevant, bank details of 25m people.  This is an outrage and the chancellor should pay for this gross incompetence, with his job.  We ask that Mr Darling resign immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
